imdb.plot outline: This TV series show 2 people (Moina and Abbas) wanting to get married. They are not from the same village, and have to overcome some obstacles to wedding. The series starts when Abbas goes to see Moina's father to ask his permission to marry her daughter, but he is rejected, cause marriages are normally organized by the parents.
imdb.title: Malezi
plot: _Malezi_ (qv) has been created by Ushababi, association born to promote the Comoros culture.::Gnambeni

This TV series show 2 people (Moina and Abbas) wanting to get married. They are not from the same village, and have to overcome some obstacles to wedding. The series starts when Abbas goes to see Moina's father to ask his permission to marry her daughter, but he is rejected, cause marriages are normally organized by the parents.::Gnambeni
